subject: Alpine Skiing
Multiple Sclerosis
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Heuga was one of the first two American men to win an Olympic medal in Alpine skiing. He was also an advocate for multiple sclerosis, the disease that curtailed his athletic career.
snippet: Mr. Heuga was one of the first two American men to win an Olympic medal in Alpine skiing. He was also an advocate for multiple sclerosis, the disease that curtailed his athletic career.
